sentences.english: The current-loop is a key subsystem of the magnetic levitation controller on maglev vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 电流环是磁浮列车悬浮控制器的重要子系统。

sentences.english: The dynamic interaction between the maglev vehicle and the three-span rigid frame bridge is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磁浮车辆与三跨刚构桥之间的耦合振动。

sentences.english: Recently, the research on maglev operation control technology is still in an original state.
sentences.chinese: 目前，磁浮列车运行控制技术还处在初始研究的阶段。

sentences.english: The proposed results can serve in the design of high-speed maglev three-span rigid frame bridges.
sentences.chinese: 所得结论可为高速磁浮三跨刚构桥设计提供理论依据。

sentences.english: Several magnetic levitated tracks had been constructed right in the riverbed. From a distance, each level was well defined.
sentences.chinese: 好几条磁浮轨道都直接铺架在河床上，看去层次分明。

sentences.english: Maglev guideway is the main part of high speed maglev transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 轨道梁是高速磁浮交通系统的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: The levitation main power supply (LMPS) of maglev vehicle is a special high power DC-DC switching power supply.
sentences.chinese: 磁浮列车的悬浮主电源是一种特殊的大功率开关电源。

sentences.english: The structure and its principle of suspension system are given.
sentences.chinese: 文中简述了磁浮列车悬浮系统的基本结构和原理。

sentences.english: Then they mocked the idea of using magnetic levitation rail like it was some sort of Voodoo ritual.
sentences.chinese: 他们还嘲笑磁浮技术，说是像巫毒邪法仪式。

sentences.english: Magnetic suspension flywheels are executing mechanism for spacecraft attitude control, which are supported by magnetic bearing.
sentences.chinese: 磁浮飞轮是采用磁轴承支承的卫星姿态控制执行机构。

definition: power car/multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组)
Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路
